sbl_is_case_sensitive_desc: If true, the search will distinguish between uppercase and lowercase letters.
sbl_require_match_all_desc: If true, only names that match all search keywords (separated by spaces) will be returned.
sbl_substitute_lookalike_characters_desc: If true, attempts to decipher names which use accented or letter-like characters.
sbl_search_id64s_desc: If true, searches the ID64 (eg. 76561197960435530) in the banlist as well as the name.
sbl_init_search_banlist_desc: Click to search for a user in your banlist.
sbl_init_search_recentlist_desc: Click to search for a user you've recently played with.
sbl_show_id64s_desc: If true, displays the ID64 of each user in the search results.
sbl_log_results_desc: If true, logs the search results to the BLT log/console in your "mods/logs/" folder.
sbl_show_all_bans_desc: Click to show all banned users.
sbl_show_all_recents_desc: Click to show all players you've recently played with.
sbl_paste_ban_desc: Click to paste a player id from your clipboard into the ban list.
sbl_dialog_add_manual_ban_desc: Type the Steam ID64 of the player to ban:
sbl_manual_ban_desc: Click to type a player id into your banlist.
sbl_prompt_search_banlist_desc: Search for a user in your banlist
sbl_prompt_search_recentlist_desc: Search for a user you recently played with
sbl_prompt_search_failure_desc: No banned users found with given search parameters
sbl_prompt_missing_qki_desc: You must have TdlQ's mod, "Quick Keyboard Input" ( https://pd2mods.z77.fr/quick_keyboard_input.html ) in order to use the search function of this mod!
sbl_dialog_recentlist_desc:
Select a user to view more options.
Showing entries $MIN - $MAX (out of $TOTAL.)
sbl_dialog_banlist_desc:
Select a user to view more options.
Showing entries $MIN - $MAX (out of $TOTAL.)
sbl_dialog_banlist_entry_desc:
Display Name: $NAME
ID: $ID
Platform: $PLATFORM
Account ID: $ACCOUNT_ID
$TIMESTAMP_LABEL: $DATE
sbl_dialog_invalid_ban_clipboard_desc: Could not read player id from clipboard. Please try re-copying the player id or restarting your game.
sbl_dialog_unban_failure_desc: Could not remove $NAME from the ban list. Please refresh and try again.
sbl_record_additional_ban_data_desc: Display additional info of banned players such as the timestamp the ban occurred and platform of the banned player while this option is enabled.
sbl_link_behavior_desc: Choose how to open Steam/FBI profile links
